Summary: I have seen at least 26 orb/ball things in the sky that show from nowhere and then blink out.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Scarborough
There were no other sightings in Scarborough on or around January 3rd 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsyeh so im a stoner pre roll joints and sit at top of a dark woods smoking pot while star gazing wat more could you do?:D and from 2009 i have seen many WHITE orbs floating at steady speed the first time i seen this there was 2 orbs gliding paralell from each other.then they blinked out i have seen many of these the best 1 i seen was quite red came upwards from the horizon like it came from land my friend said it was a flair it stopped dead then moved right i asked him how it could be a flair they dont stop dead then move another direction this 1 didnt blink out it shot in a north direction very fast fastest thing i seen,it just pisses me of trying to get threw to these brainwashed idiots to make them believe what i seen not many people do :'[ i donni cair i cnt be the only 1 to be spotting these things its only a momant of time before they land. ~Brodie
